column1: ConditionsPursuant to Article 29 of the San Francisco PoliceCode, a Night Noise Permit for operation in the PublicRight-of-Way shall be required for work that createsany noise 5dBA above the ambient noise level of thatarea at the nearest property plane.The Permit Holder shall disclose at the time ofapplication ALL equipment and tools to be used in thepublic right-of-way in conjunction with the proposedwork. Failure to do so may result in revocation of thepermit and may follow with associated notice(s) ofviolation and fines.It shall be the permit holderâ€™s responsibility to obtain aNight Noise Permit for any work which creates sound5dBA above the ambient level of that area at thenearest property plane. Failure to obtain appropriatepermits will result in appropriate action taken by theCity and may result in notices of violation withassociated fines, revocation of the permit foroccupancy and/or work, and/or other consequences.A Night Noise Permit shall be required for use of any ofthe following equipment including but not limited to:-          Vehicle with back-up beepers/alarms-          Generators-          Vacuums/Vac-trucks-          Power toolsEvent/Operation:AT&T Manhole AccessPermit Linear Footage1000Elements of OccupancyEntering AT&T Manholes to place innerduct and cable.

From:4/27/2016 9:00PMStart Time9:00PMTo:4/28/2016 4:00AMEnd Time4:00AMNeed to call for InspectionNeed to post tow-away signTo activate and register this permit for towing, call(415) 554-5824 a minimum of 72 hours prior tooccupancy.  To tow a vehicle call the Tow Desk at(415) 553-1200.Special Traffic permit requiredCALL FOR Special traffic permit MAY BE required(Please check DPT Blue Book for any trafficrestrictions; to obtain a "Blue Book", please contactMTA at (415) 701-4673).Food:NOther:Performing Arts:NStreet Space Hours9:00PM Thru 4:00AMMeter Segment(s)09TH AVE: CLEMENT ST to GEARY BLVD (300 -399) 04/27/2016 thru 04/28/2016 (2 days) GEARYBLVD: 08TH AVE to 09TH AVE (4400 - 4498) --NORTH -- 04/27/2016 thru 04/28/2016 (2 days)GEARY BLVD: 09TH AVE to 10TH AVE (4501 - 4599)-- SOUTH -- 04/27/2016 thru 04/28/2016 (2 days)Night Noise

column4: Prior to construction, all CCSFsurvey monuments shall bereferenced by a licensed LandSurveyor on a Corner Record ora Record of Survey if anyconstruction will take placewithin 10 ft of a monument. Forany questions, please emailMonument.Preservation@sfdpw.org or call 415-554-5827.Note, all survey monumentsshall be preserved per state lawand disturbance of a surveymonument may be a crime.
